Designation: Technical Analyst- Technical Support on C/C++/Shell/Perl Python
Job Description: Job description The Team-We are actively seeking candidates for a unique opportunity to join a growing team working with our products and solutions for stocks, derivatives and foreign exchange markets. The role presents an excellent opportunity to gain experience with cutting-edge technology and financial markets around the globe. We have a dynamic, fast-paced and friendly working environment.As a Technical Analyst, you will be part of our Client Services team and will be responsible for assuring high standards of technical services delivered to the customers using FlexTrades products and solutions. You will get to interact with customers, development teams and QA teams, understand the business and design aspects of the solutions.About You-You are good at both client-facing and technical aspects to provide a high-quality technical relationship between our clients and the Client Services team:Relationship Management:You love to liaise with clients directly to define and understand business and workflow requirementsYou know how to manage client expectationsYou act as primary technical contact to allocated clients for new requirements, support and project deliverables.Support:You respond to reports of problems via phone and emailYou are good at troubleshooting and investigating in order to create appropriate solutions to immediate problems.You provide periodic updates about investigations to the clients. Publish RCA notes upon conclusion of investigation.You can collaborate with development & QA teams to get application defects fixed. Apply patch releases into UAT & Prod environments. Communicate release notes to the clients and other relevant parties.You are comfortable with morning shifts starting 8am on rotational basisYou can work occasional bank/public holiday cover and weekend work may be required.Implementation and design:You can formulate the business and workflow requirements into technical solutionsYou use technical design and development skills to resolve complex problems across many differentplatforms. Build tools and scripts in shell scripts/perl/python/C++ etc. to automate or assist inmaintenance and implementation of the systems.You can work alongside developers throughout the firm to design, build, test and deploy custom solutionsYou know how to on-board client and broker connections to our FIX networkYou love to implement and test new FX liquidity providers onto the FlexTrade liquidity aggregation engineYou work with teams across the firm to continually improve the product and drive future innovation.Required:The suitable candidate should have following skills-Bachelors (or higher) degree in Engineering/Technology or equivalent acceptable industry certification.Experience in client interaction and support role for a duration ranging between 2-5 years.Technical expertise and a desire to improve in the following technologies: Linux/Unix, Shell-scripting, Perl/Python, C, C++.Good communication skills (written & oral), ability to communicate confidently and concisely to both  business and technical experts – from clients and colleagues.Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to communicate solutions.Ability to occasionally build solutions using Shell scripts/Perl/Python or C++ to address problems while supporting/maintaining the systems.Well-organised work habits with attention to details.Ability to work under pressure while remaining calmPositive & passionate work attitude, motivated and result-oriented.Working experience with EMS/ OMS/ Trading platform development projects in either/all of the following domains will be advantageous: Capital Markets (Equity, Derivatives), OTC/Listed Foreign Exchange (FX) Markets.Prior exposure with the following will be considered as an advantage: FIX protocol, concepts of Algorithmic Trading.RoleSoftware Development - Job Description: Job descriptionJob Brief :We are looking for an analytical, results-driven Firmware Engineer. You would be required to have a keen eye for developing firmware with a low memory footprint and low power consumption while being robust and resistant to errors. You are expected to achieve these goals using your in-depth understanding of the programming language, compilers, microcontroller architectures and debugging tools. You are expected to keep a look out for upcoming advancements in the industry which will help optimize the product.To succeed as a Firmware Engineer, you should be focused on building a better, more efficient firmware while being able to navigate through obscure datasheets and sparsely documented vendor SDKs. This requires you to always be curious, collaborative and motivated.Main Responsibilities :Your responsibilities will include :- Would be asked to write efficient, modular and robust firmware which will interface with multiple components like MEMS sensors, battery chargers, secondary microcontrollers etc.- Writing clean, readable, and modular code- Would be deeply involved in the schematic design for a product which includes cost-benefit analysis of components, component evaluation by designing a proof of concept, suggestions in how the components should be connected etc.- Collaborate with software engineers who would develop companion applications to the productKey Requirements :- 2+ years in developing firmware using C\C++- Should have worked with a ARM Cortex M series device like STM32, nRF52 etc- Familiar with basic data structures like linked lists, queues, trees etc.- Should be able to compile and link source code with static libraries without using an IDE- Basic knowledge of microcontrollers peripherals like UART, I2C, SPI, ADC etc.Optional Requirements :- Worked with communications protocols like BLEWiFi- Experience is PCB layout and schematic design- Familiar with Python- Worked with equipment like logic analyzers, oscilloscopes etc.- Worked on microcontrollers from Dialog Semiconductors, Nordic Semiconductors, STMicroelectronics, Espressif etc.- Worked on projects involving DSP, AIMLRoleFirmware Developer,Industry TypeIT Services & Consulting,Functional AreaEngineering - Hardware & Networks,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryHardwareEducationUG :B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization, B.Sc in Any Specialization, BCA in Any SpecializationPG :Any PostgraduateDoctorate :Doctorate Not RequiredKey SkillsFirmware EngineeringDSPC++Cschematic designUARTnRF52Dialog SemiconductorsBLEWiFiAI/MLSTM32PCB layoutPythonmicrocontrollersSkills highlighted with ‘‘ are preferred keyskills

About Company: Agiliad is an engineering and R&D house and provide product design services globally to hi-tech companies. We have a strong domain focus in medical devices, Storage, Cloud and Computing platforms, and Industrial Automation. We are a niche company with 700+ highly skilled engineers. The company name Agiliad is made up of two words: Agility (quick response) and Iliad (heroic efforts). We pride ourselves on our agility to adapt seamlessly to new market needs, customer requirements or technological change, and thrive in an environment of constant change. We endeavour to work on complex and challenging systems and engineering problems and where possible create a meaningful difference by focusing on critical needs. Some of the key points why someone should look at Agiliad: • Highly differentiated product engineering service provider • Opportunity to work on some exciting technologies... we work all the way from board design, embedded systems to application development. • Focus is to build high impact smaller teams. • Very intense environment, execution focus, most of the projects follow Agile development.

Post By: kalpanaCompany Recruiter at MSys Tech India Pvt. Ltd.
Job Description: Job descriptionJob Description: Transceiver/Optics/DAC/AOC skill sets and work scope Mandatory Requirements  Expert in C C++ programming and data structures  Experience in working with different types of transceivers (SFP, SFP+, QSFP, SFP28, QSFP28 etc.)  and cables (AOC, DACs etc.) along with the knowledge of EEPROM and MSA standards.  Experience in physical layer (Layer-1) and its software driver development  Exposure on different PHY and MAC drivers.  Experience working on I2C, GPIO, MDIO, Interrupts Knowledge Area and skills  Transceivers types, MSA standards and I2C interface (including driver and the I2C device tree  architecture)  Transceiver EEPROM memory map definitions and registers.  Physical layer, MAC, PHY and ASIC interfaces, different IEEE Ethernet standards.  Experience in working with PHY and ASIC SDKs   Experience in working with OVSDB. Desired Skills  Networking product development  Linux based software applications and development environment  Exposure to board bring up and diagnostics.  Working experience with different IO control devices like FPGA, EPLD etc. Scope of the work 1. Platform Independent (PI) a. PI is generic code that covers most aspect of software state machine for the transceivers b. Transceiver Initialization, Identification, Validation (HPID). c. Tuning and enablement/disablement of transceiver based on type. d. Optical transceiver laser management and DOM 2. PD  PMD a. FPGA, I2C, SIO i. Different HW architectures to control and report transceiver signals. ii. Transceiver detection and hot-swap infra. iii. MISC HW interfaces to BSP for EEPROM access iv. Transceiver interrupts 3. L1 a. ASIC SDK interaction. b. Platform L1 PD based on ASIC family. c. PHY drivers. 4. Enablement of existing transceiver on a new platform  a. Involves PI work b. YAML and support list update for new platform. 5. Enablement of new transceivers on existing platform a. Potentially PI work and depending on the type of transceiver there may be PD work as  wellb. Identification and validation updates per new transceiver EEPROM memory map  scheme. c. Above items listed in PI. 6. Enablement of new transceiver and new platform  a. A summation of both above b. Depending on HW interface to XCVR may involve extra PD work or new PD  implementation. 7. Hardware Specific a. Hardware Specification b. Hardware Schematics and IO documents c. HW Interface definition for the interface used to XCVR signal management. d. BSP drivers (I2C, IO control) e. HW interface updates (FEPLD, CPLD or FPGA, VCB etc.) 8. HW Testing and Qualification a. Owned by HW team on the selected platforms b. Interface tuning c. Parametric testing 9. Transceiver qualification  a. Transceiver I2C conformance etc.RoleBack End Developer,Industry TypeIT Services & Consulting,Functional AreaEngineering - Software & QA,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategorySoftware DevelopmentEducationUG :Any GraduateKey SkillsProtocolsCL1Data StructuresL2Protocol StackNetworkingLTEProtocol Developmentphysical LayerSkills highlighted with ‘‘ are preferred keyskills
